string.text: Hey stalker, we have many problems here, which did you hear about?
Barkeep sent me, said you had some sort of mutant trouble?
Indeed we have. We've been under attack from strange mutants and I have lost three of my best fighters! They seem to be coming from the nearby underground lab, so we locked its gates down.
How can I help?

Well, we got the Ecologists to mix up a deadly cocktail of poisonous gases to kill the bastards, but it hasn't worked. We can still hear them howling. Someone will have to go in there with a gas mask and assess the situation.
I suppose that's where I come in, right?

Here's the deal: Get a gas mask, go in there, and kill whatever is left of the bastards. About four of them. My men have seen them at the construction site and our headquarters. Retrieve the PDAs off my three fallen fighters and I'm sure I can return the favor, somehow.
Where can I get a mask from?
I have one. But if you need one more, then go see the Ecologists in the nearby tunnel, they're sure to have one. I'll give you the coordinates.
OK, I'll be back with the PDAs!
Do you have the PDAs for me and killed all the mutants?
No, not yet. I'm working on it.
The mutants are all dead. Here are your men's PDAs.
I thank you, stalker. Now we can go back to our headquarters in peace. We'll filter out the gasses right now. Now, what can we do for you in return?
You mentioned that the gate to the underground is locked.
I am here about that problem.
Hey stalker. Thanks again, you are a legend. I was going to help, but last week I took a bullet to the knee!
Yeah, yeah, no problem!
So, have you managed to kill all of them yet?
No, not yet. I'm working on it.
Yes, they are all dead. It should be real safe here now.
Great job! I spoke to Colonel Petrenko while you were down there. He was impressed by your bravado and said he has just the task for a hero like yourself.
OK, I'm listening.

We've had some Stalker boys in the Dark Valley telling us some intriguing things about Monolith activities. Apparently there's a lab named X18 under their base. I'm not sure what exactly is buried under there, but neither do the Monolith. They can't open it yet, or maybe they don't want to. The information is pretty sketchy.
And you want in?

Yep. Whatever is in those labs will attract... the Sins – those damn abhorrations. Go to the old barn, the mates over there have a pretty solid plan. We needed an executioner, and we think we found him. Bring me whatever you can find after your digging, and you will gain great favour with the big-wigs. Any bit of info, however small, can be crucial. When you are done, report to the Colonel in the bar.
Ok, I'll go see them and report to the Colonel.

Well, that place is a restricted area, and we think there are or were nests of these mutants down there. But I tell you what, if you go down there and clear the place out, I won't ask any questions and turn a blind eye. Deal?
Sure. So who has the key?

Usually our leader, Petrenko, has the key. But he gave it to me. It's sad that so many were killed by those damn Bloodsuckers... I've got to warn you before I give you the key to the lab underneath Rostok: there's a sort of "Bloodsucker King" down there. That's why we sealed it off in the first place - it's a damn nest! If you're really going down there, drag that ugly bastard to Hell for me, will you? Here's the key then. They're all yours, stalker.
Thanks, see you.
The mutants are all dead. Here are your men's PDAs.
Thank you Brother. Now we can go back to our headquarters in peace. We'll filter out the gasses right now. There's just one more thing we need done.
Sure, what is it?
Well, we think there might still be a nest of these mutants down in the lab. Please go down there and clear the place out, you will win favor with Duty's elite for sure!
Sure, no problem. You said it's locked though, so who has the key?
Here it is, go well brother!
Thanks, I'll be back soon.
We didn't finish talking about something...
About what?
About the lab: you said it was locked down, right? I have to get inside, so I need the key. Where can I get it?

Yeah, it was - and there's a reason for that: we think there are or were nests of these mutants down there... but screw the formality. If you go down there and clear the place out, I won't ask any questions and turn a blind eye. Comrade Petrenko used to hold that key, but he granted me it when I'd been headed here. If you're really going down there, drag that ugly bastard to Hell for me, will you? Anyway, here's the key then. Good luck!
Thank you! I can assure you nobody will ever recall the local Bloodsuckers after some time.
About that "one more thing". What do I have to do?

We think there might still be a nest of these mutants down in the lab. If you go down there and clear the place out, you will win favor with Duty's elite for sure! Here's the key - you can access the lab right away.
I got you. It will be cleared out as soon as possible!
Hey stalker, what can I do for you?
Dima from Duty said you might have a gas mask for me.
Ah, so you are the crazy one who will go in there! Well, here it is. If you'll need gasmask, I'll give you. Just be swift and you'll be fine.
Thanks.
Hey stalker, have you cleared out the factory yet?
Not yet, I'm still working on it.
Well, good luck stalker!
Yeah, thanks.
Do you have another gas mask?
Yes, but I can't give you any more for free. One usually costs 3500 rubles...

Not to offend you young man, but... haven't I already stated we struggle to get equipment in these parts? Even if there are some masks left, those can only be used internally but not sold - however regretful.
Here's the money.
Well... I'll manage without it then.
And here's your gas mask. Be careful with it: it's almost impossible to get one here!
Sorry but I can't just give such things away for free: I'll have to pay for them in this case.
I'll try. Well, good luck with the experiments.
Yeah, makes sense... Anyway, I won't disturb you then.
Hey stalker, thank you for clearing the factory. I will now go and neutralise the gas so we can claim our headquarters back!
A pleasure. See you.
Hey Stalker, good to see you again. We have cleared out the toxic gases and its business as usual, good job!
Hey, yeah no problem, glad i could help, see you.
Hey stalker, what can we do for you?
What are you guys doing here?
It's all top secret, but if I were you, I would go and see the Duty leader in the village before roaming around these parts.
Thanks for the tip I guess.
I am here about supplies.

Yep, Voronin told me he sent some newbie. We are in deep shit there... fleshes, boars, dogs, strange creatures, military, lots of shit we couldn't handle without any reinforcement, at least we receive supplies every week so we can handle the situation properly. Did you bring any ammo and supplies?
Yep, here it is.
Nope, I didn't bring any.

Thank you man, I am not sure how we would've dealt with the problem without this, we have wounded guys here too, so they desperately needed it. I will report to Colonel immediately about your good job.
Well then what are you doing here? Bring us some supplies and then we can talk about your reward.
